Blog.post: Today at my church we had communion and there were little pieces of bread nicley cut, not crudely. So who does cut up all those pieces of bread?

the cow jumped over the moon, why?

How many dollar pieces? How many Susan Bs? How many cows? How many gold coins? How many sunken ships? How many pesos? Well that was just a random thought I had at Boca today.
I dont have any randomthoughts at the momment other than a funny pick up line from Juanna You must be a parking ticket because you got fine fine fine written all over you.

Well today I went to help Timmy with his car. His battery died. I went in there with the battery and was going to act stupid. And say Hey can I get a refill, do you just refill it with joules or calories, or does it really matter. Which would you perfer to fill it with, it sure doesn't make a difference to me. have have ever wondered why we wash bath towels arent we cleaned when we get out of the shower.
Toucan is spelled toucan not tucan so ha I win.
How do you spell toucan? The bird. Is it tocan, tucan, two can, toucan, toocan, twocan, hmmmmmm the world may never know.
My bro and I were walking along and we saw an ostrich take flight. THen we saw a bear with toucan on its shoulder. It was cool.
One day you are sitting in a car on a nice sunny day and all of a sudden the sun burns out. What do you do? How long will you live?

“You know, you look really hot. You must be the real reason for global warming.” “Is there an airport nearby or is that just my heart taking off?” “If I could rearrange the alphabet, I’d put U and I together.” "Did it hurt...when you fell to Earth from Heaven?" Do your feet hurt,... cus you have been running through my mind all day
